mutants.original_line: return area(w1, h1) + area(w2, h2) + mod(w1, w2)
mutants.mutated_line: return area(w1, h1) + area(w2, h2) - mod(w1, w2)

mutants.original_line: return area(w1, h1) + area(w2, h2) + mod(w1, w2)
mutants.mutated_line: return (area(w1, h1) + area(w2, h2)) * mod(w1, w2)

mutants.original_line: return area(w1, h1) + area(w2, h2) + mod(w1, w2)
mutants.mutated_line: return area(w1, h1) - area(w2, h2) + mod(w1, w2)

mutants.original_line: return area(w1, h1) + area(w2, h2) + mod(w1, w2)
mutants.mutated_line: return area(w1, h1) * area(w2, h2) + mod(w1, w2)
